Container.Name: Collexions
Container.Overview: Collexions is a Python script that automatically manages pinned collections on the Plex home screen for specified libraries. It runs in a continuous loop, periodically unpinning old collections and pinning a new selection based on rules defined in config.json (special dates, categories, exclusions, recency, minimum item count). Uses the plexapi library. Requires config.json to be set up in the AppData path.
Container.Description: Automatically rotate pinned Plex collections based on configurable rules.

Config.Name: Config File Path
Config.Description: Container Path: /app/config.json - Path on your Unraid host where config.json is stored. You MUST create this file.

Config.Name: State File Path
Config.Description: Container Path: /app/selected_collections.json - Path on your Unraid host where the script stores its pinning history. The script will create this if it doesn't exist.

Config.Name: Log Directory
Config.Description: Container Path: /app/logs - Path on your Unraid host where the script will write its log files.

Config.Name: Timezone
Config.Description: Set your local timezone (e.g., America/New_York, Europe/London) for correct date/time functions. Find yours here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones
